name: Timewise: 7 Days with Edward
description:
Timewise is a game where your character, Edward, needs to complete a given number of tasks each day. If your happiness or time runs out before you could finish it all, it is game over. Spend your time wisely.

CONTROLS:

LMB - Move

RMB - Dash

Space/E - Interact

Music Credits:

Full 8-Bit JRPG Soundtrack (downloadable and editable) Music Pack | OpenGameArt.org

This game is made in the B&W Game Jam, with the theme of:

"You only realize the value of something when it's gone."

Any comments or feedbacks would be greatly appreciated. :D
